sentences.en: She still appeared to be an idiosyncratic figure.
sentences.cn: 她似乎仍然是一个特殊的人物。

sentences.en: His teaching methods are idiosyncratic but successful.
sentences.cn: 他的教学方法很奇特，但很成功。

sentences.en: The speaking voice, by contrast, is something idiosyncratic, irregular, particular.
sentences.cn: 相反地，说话的声音是与众不同的，不规律的，特别的。
